response.answer_text: Hey there! Spotify ads are advertisements that listeners either see or hear from advertisers on the app. Advertisers can order an advertisement from a salesperson at Spotify, or choose to create and upload their own with Spotify’s ad platform (the world’s first-ever self-serve ad platform). Advertisements on Spotify are pretty affordable, so brands of all sizes can indulge. You can learn more about the types of Spotify ads you can invest in here.
